Sincerely,
John Young

Subject: Progress of Felix Jose
Dear Sir,
Felix Jose has nothing more to prove at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an AVG of .404 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
